hours_text:
## Hours

**October – March  
**Mon, Thu, Fri, Sat & Sun – _12:00PM to 4:00PM CST_

**April – September  
**Mon, Fri & Sat – _9:00AM to 4:00PM CST_  
Thu & Sun – _12:00PM to 4:00PM CST_

**Last admission to the museum is at 3:30PM CST**

## Admissions

Special Events - Pricing will vary.

General Admission - $11.00

Youth (6-17) - $8.00

Children (0-5) - Free

Seniors (65+) - $8.00

Active Duty Military, Veterans, First Responders - $8.00

collections_text:
we can. we will. we must.

Commemorating Our Military Heritage

Evansville Wartime Museum encompasses walk through galleries and exhibits of our area’s wartime history and achievements. You’ll see examples of wartime production, the stories of area veterans and some of the vehicles from the WWII era. This is the place to visit for a surprising, interesting and world-changing story of our community’s involvement in winning WWII. We look forward to your visit!

[ About EWM ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251206023253/https://www.evansvillewartimemuseum.org/about/about-us)

Visit Us!

  * [ Exhibits ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251206023253/https://www.evansvillewartimemuseum.org/explore/exhibits)
  * [ Tank Rides ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251206023253/https://www.evansvillewartimemuseum.org/explore/tank-rides)
  * [ Tours ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251206023253/https://www.evansvillewartimemuseum.org/explore/tours)
  * [ Buy Tickets ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251206023253/https://www.evansvillewartimemuseum.org/buy-tickets)
  * [ Membership ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251206023253/https://www.evansvillewartimemuseum.org/support/membership)
